title: Adjustment of BlocksPerYear
description:
WhisperNode is proposing to adjust BlocksPerYear parameter to normalize the inflation rate and reward rate.

Full details surrounding the calculations of actual vs. theoretical inflation can be found here:
https://ipfs.io/ipfs/QmYeJXCsNpbpvWRWufJqgEC2XdSFzPGcQQdmU99gJJofop
